attributes.action: Change the Fact that if you Hit a cat with your car, you take it to the vets!
attributes.additional_details: On the 16th off July 2022 our beautiful girl named dotty was found on the side off the road in a bush   Injured! My other half ran over to her, he picked her up and she took her last breath, she was ice cold in his arms. We went straight to the vets and they had announced she had sadly passed. They also said if she had been taken in when it happened then she may have survived.
attributes.background: If you hit a dog you'll need to call the police. Unfortunately for their owners, if you hit a cat you don't need to do so, change the fact that if a cat gets hit you have the call it in also!

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about the death of your cat. Please accept our condolences.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607317
